Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class AddressLookupTableProgram

java.lang.Object
com.lmax.solana4j.programs.AddressLookupTableProgram
public final class AddressLookupTableProgram extends Object
Program for managing address lookup tables on the Solana blockchain.

  • Field Details

    • PROGRAM_ACCOUNT

      public static final PublicKey PROGRAM_ACCOUNT
      The public key for the address lookup table program account.

      This constant defines the public key associated with the Solana account for the address lookup table program. It is set to the value returned by Solana.account(byte[]) using the ADDRESS_LOOKUP_TABLE_PROGRAM.

    • CREATE_LOOKUP_TABLE_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int CREATE_LOOKUP_TABLE_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for creating a lookup table.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to create a new address lookup table in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • EXTEND_LOOKUP_TABLE_INSTRUCTION

      public static final int EXTEND_LOOKUP_TABLE_INSTRUCTION
      The instruction code for extending a lookup table.

      This constant defines the instruction code used to extend an existing address lookup table in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LOOKUP_TABLE_META_SIZE

      public static final int LOOKUP_TABLE_META_SIZE
      The size of the lookup table metadata in bytes.

      This constant defines the fixed size of the metadata for an address lookup table in Solana.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      public AddressLookupTableProgram createLookupTable(ProgramDerivedAddress programDerivedAddress, PublicKey authority, PublicKey payer, Slot recentSlot)
      Creates a new address lookup table.
      Parameters:
      programDerivedAddress - the program derived address
      authority - the authority public key
      payer - the payer public key
      recentSlot - the recent slot
      Returns:
      this AddressLookupTableProgram instance

    • extendLookupTable

      public AddressLookupTableProgram extendLookupTable(PublicKey lookupTable, PublicKey authority, PublicKey payer, List<PublicKey> addresses)
      Extends an existing address lookup table with new addresses.
      Parameters:
      lookupTable - the lookup table public key
      authority - the authority public key
      payer - the payer public key
      addresses - the list of new addresses to add
      Returns:
      this AddressLookupTableProgram instance

      public static ProgramDerivedAddress deriveAddress(PublicKey authority, Slot slot)
      Derives a program address for the given authority and slot.
      Parameters:

      slot - the slot
      Returns:
      the derived program address

    • deserializeAddressLookupTable

      public static AddressLookupTable deserializeAddressLookupTable(PublicKey lookupTableAddress, byte[] lookupAddressData)
      Deserializes an address lookup table from the given data.
      Parameters:
      lookupTableAddress - the lookup table public key
      lookupAddressData - the serialized lookup table data
      Returns:
      the deserialized address lookup table
